column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ ɔwɔ beebi rosɔr
column3: na ogyaae no
column4: n'esuafo no mu baako see no dɛ
column7: dɛ mbrɛ John so kyerɛkyerɛɛ n'esuafo no."

column2: "Na ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column3: Sɛ hom rosɔr a
column4: hom nse dɛ

column2: "Ma hɛn hɛn daa daa edziban daa."
"Na fa hɛn bɔn kyɛ hɛn
column3: osiandɛ hɛn so yɛdze kyɛ obiara a ɔdze hɛn kaw. Na mma mmfa hɛn nnkɔ nsɔhwɛ mu."

column2: "Na ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column3: Hom mu woana na ɔwɔ nyɛnko
column4: na ɔbɔkɔ ne nkyɛn esuom akɛse no dɛ

column2: "na me nyɛnko bi nam kwan aba me nkyɛn na minnya hwee nnsi n'enyim;"
"na ɔno dze
column3: obefi dan mu noho ebua dɛ
column4: Mma nnhaw me: wɔatow abow mu dada na me mba wɔ me nkyɛn wɔ mpa do: murunntum nnsoɛr mmbɛma wo bi?"

column2: "Mese hom dɛ
column3: Kaansa ɔnnkɔsoɛr abɛma no dɛ ɔyɛ ne nyɛnko ntsi a
column4: n'anoɔdzen ntsi ɔbɔsoɛr abɛma no dodow a ohia no."

column2: "Na mese hom dɛ
column3: Hom mbisa na wɔbɛma hom; hom nhwehwɛ na hom bohu; hom mbɔ mu na wobobue ama hom:"

column2: "na obiara a obisa no onya; na nyia ɔhwehwɛ no ohu; na nyia ɔbɔ mu no wobobue no."
"Na hom mu woana na ɔyɛ egya
column3: na sɛ ne ba bisa no paanoo a
column4: ɔbɛma no ɔbo? Anaa esunam a
column5: ɔdze ɔwɔ bɛyɛ esunam ama no?"

column2: "Anaadɛ obisa kyirefuwa a
column3: ɔbɛma no nyankomaketsebowa?"

column2: "Na sɛ hom a hom muo yi mpo nyim mbrɛ hom si dze akyɛdze pa ma hom mba a
column3: mpɛn ahen ara na hom Egya a ɔwɔ sor no nnkɛfa Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn ama hɔn a wobisa no?"

column2: "Nna orutu sunsum fi bi a ɔyɛ mmum. Na ɔbaa dɛ sunsum fi no fiir edzi no
column3: mmum no kasae; na ɔyɛɛ nyimpadodow no nwanwa."

column2: "Na hɔn mu binom see dɛ
column3: Ɔnam sunsum fi panyin Beelzebul do na otu sunsum fi."

column2: "Na binom so sɔɔ no hwɛe bisaa no hɔ asɛnkyerɛdze a ofi sor."
"Na ɔno dze onyim hɔn adwen no
column3: ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column4: Ahenman biara nye noho dzi mpaapaamu a
column6: na fie bi so nye fie bi dzi a

column2: "Na sɛ Satan so nye noho dzi mpaapaamu a
column3: ɔbɛyɛ dɛn na n'ahenman egyina? Osiandɛ hom se dɛ menam Beelzebul do tu esunsum fi."

column2: "Na sɛ emi menam Beelzebul do tu sunsum bɔn a
column3: woana do na hom mba nam tu hɔn? Dɛm ntsi hɔn na wɔbɛyɛ hom atsɛmbuafo."

column2: "Na sɛ menam Nyankopɔn nsatseaba do tu esunsum bɔn a
column3: nna Nyankopɔn ahenman enya aba hom nkyɛn."

column2: "Sɛ ɔkatakyi emia roweɔn n'aban a
column3: n'ahodze wɔ hɔ komm:"

column2: "na sɛ obi a ɔkyɛn no ahoɔdzen ba no do
column3: na odzi no do nyim a
column4: ɔgye n'akodze a no werɛ twer

column2: "Nyia ɔnnka mo ho no
column3: na ɔnye me enya; nyia ɔnye me mmboaboa ano no
column4: ɔhotse gu."

column2: "Na sunsum bɔn
column3: sɛ ofi nyimpa mu fir a
column4: okekyin wewewdo hwehwɛ ahomgye na onnya bi a
column6: Mebɛsan akɔ me fie a mifii mu bae no mu;"

column2: "na ɔba a
column3: ɔto no dɛ wɔaprapra mu na woesiesie mu."

column2: "Nna ɔkɔ kɛfa esunsum esuon afofor a womuo sen nankasa ka noho
column3: na wɔbɛhɛn mu tsena hɔ: na nyimpa no n'ekyir asetsena yɛ bɔn sen nkan no dze."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ ɔreka yinom no
column3: ɔbaa bi a ɔwɔ nyimpadodow no mu maa ne ndze do see no dɛ
column4: Nhyira aka yafun a ɔwoo wo

column2: "Na ɔno dze
column3: ɔsee dɛ
column4: Mbom nhyira aka hɔn a wotsie Nyankopɔn asɛm na wodzi do."

column2: "Na nyimpadodow boaboaa ano no
column3: ɔhyɛɛ ase kaa dɛ
column4: Ɔsantsen yi yɛ ɔsantsen a omuo: wɔhwehwɛ asɛnkyerɛdze
column5: na wɔremma hɔn asɛnkyerɛdze biara dɛ Jona n'asɛnkyerɛdze no."

column2: "Na dɛ mbrɛ wɔyɛɛ Jona asɛnkyerɛdze maa Ninivefo no
column3: dɛmara na nyimpa Ba no bɛyɛ ama ɔsantsen yi."
column4: "#Jona 3.4"

column2: "Pomu afamu ɔhembaa nye ɔsantsen yi mbarimba bɔsoɛr wɔ atsɛmbu no mu
column3: na oebu hɔn fɔ: osiandɛ ofi asaase ano noho bae betsiee Solomon ne nyansaa
column4: na hwɛ

column2: "Ninive mbarimba nye ɔsantsen yi bɔsoɛr wɔ atsɛmbu no mu
column3: na woebu hɔn fɔ: osiandɛ wonuu hɔnho wɔ Jona n'asɛnka ase
column4: na hwɛ

column2: "Obi nnsɔ kandzea nnsi kukua mu
column3: anaa kuruw ase
column4: na ɔdze si kandzeadua do
column5: ma hɔn a wɔhɛn mu eehu kan no."

column2: "Nyimpadua ne kandzea nye w'enyiwa: dɛm ntsi ber a w'enyiwa yɛ kann no
column3: nna wo nyimpadua nyina so bɛyɛ kann; na ber a omuo no
column4: nna wo nyimpadua no so yɛ kusuww."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi hwɛ ma kan a ɔwɔ wo mu aannyɛ sum."
"Na sɛ wo nyimpadua nyina yɛ kann
column3: na beebiara nnyi sum a
column4: ne nyina bɛyɛ kann
column5: dɛ mbrɛ kandzea dze ne hyerɛn hyɛnhyɛnn ma wo kan no."

column2: "Na ɔrekasa no
column3: Farisiinyi bi bebisaa no dɛ ɔnye no nkedzidzi
column4: na ɔkɔr mu kɛtsenaa edzidzii."

column2: "Na Farisiinyi no hun dɛ ɔannhohor ne nsa ho ansaana oridzidzi no
column3: ɔyɛɛ no nwanwa."

column2: "Na Ewuradze see no dɛ
column3: Afei hom Farisiifo dze
column4: hom twuw nkɔɔpow nye mprɛtse ho

column2: "Nkwasea
column3: ana nnyɛ nyia ɔyɛɛ ekyir no
column4: ɔnoara na ɔyɛɛ no mu so?"

column2: "Na hwɛ
column3: hom mfa dza ɔwɔ mu no bi nyɛ ayɛ
column4: na ɔno na ɔbɛma adze nyina ho efir ama hom."

column2: "Na hom ndue
column3: hom Farisiifo! Na hom yi eme nye nunum nye fan nyina do ebupɛn du du ma
column4: na hom twa atsɛmbu nye Nyankopɔn dɔ no gya: na iyi na ɔsɛ dɛ nkyɛ hom yɛ
column5: ber a hom nndan dza ɔaka no so nngya."

column2: "Hom ndue
column3: hom Farisiifo! Na hom pɛ mpanyin ngua wɔ nhyiamudan mu nye gua do nkyiakyia."

column2: "Hom ndue! Na hom tse dɛ nda a ɔnnda edzi
column3: na nyimpa a wɔnam do nnhu."

column2: "Na mbrakyerɛfo no mu baako buae see no dɛ
column3: Kyerɛkyerɛfo
column4: ese dɛm a

column2: "Na ɔsee dɛ
column3: Hom mbrakyerɛfo so
column4: hom ndue! Na hom soa nyimpa ndzesoadze a no soa yɛ yaw
column6: hom mmfa hom nsatseaba kor mpo nnka ndzesoadze no."

column2: "Hom ndue! Na hom tow nkɔnhyɛfo nda do
column3: naaso homara hom egyanom kum hɔn."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi hom dzi hom egyanom ndwuma ho dase
column3: na hom so pen do
column4: osiandɛ hɔn na wokum hɔn
column5: na hom na hom tow hɔn nda do."

column2: "Iyi ntsi na Nyankopɔn ne nyansaa se dɛ
column3: Mobɔsoma nkɔnhyɛfo nye asomafo wɔ hɔn hɔ
column4: na woboku
column5: na wobehiahia hɔn mu binom ho;"

column2: "ama nkɔnhyɛfo nyina bɔgyaa a wɔkae gui
column3: ofitsi wiadze ahyɛse no
column4: wɔaahwehwɛ no ɔsantsen yi nsamu:"

column2: "ofitsi Abel no bɔgyaa do besi Zekaria a ɔtɔr afɔrmbukyia nye asɔrdan ntamu no no bɔgyaa do
column3: ɛhɛɛ
column4: mese hom dɛ wɔbɔhwehwɛ no ɔsantsen yi nsamu."

column2: "Hom mbrakyerɛfo
column3: hom ndue! Na hom afa nyimdzee saafee: homankasa hom annkɔ mu
column4: na hɔn a wɔrokɔ mu no so

column2: "Na ɔreka yinom kyerɛ hɔn no
column3: kyerɛwfo nye Farisiifo no hyɛɛ ase hyehyɛɛ no do pii
column4: na wɔgyegyee no kasa wɔ ndzɛmba pii ho;"

column2: "na wɔtsɛɛw no hwehwɛɛ dɛ wobenya n'anomu asɛm bi eesuo mu."
